checkDiagLR(char) - Method in class core.Connect4
Checks every possible diagonal top left to right for 4 consecutive spaces that match param c character
checkDiagRL(char) - Method in class core.Connect4
Checks every possible diagonal top right to left for 4 consecutive spaces that match param c character
checkHorizontal(char) - Method in class core.Connect4
Checks every row for 4 consecutive spaces that match the player's character.
checkVertical(char) - Method in class core.Connect4
Checks every column for 4 consecutive spaces that param c character.
checkWinner(Connect4.Player) - Method in class core.Connect4
Checks game board for 4 consecutive spaces filled with player's char in horizontal, vertical, or diagognal directions
